content.rendered:
Home

International Students – Entry Requirements

Here at Regent College London, we understand that it can be a challenge in moving to and studying in a different country, but we’re here to help. We offer guidance and support through every step of your Regent College London journey, from the application process, to fees and scholarships to helping you settle into your new surroundings, we are here to help.

For entry requirements please select your country:

  • Bangladesh
  • Colombia
  • India
  • Japan
  • Kenya
  • Malaysia
  • Nepal
  • Nigeria
  • Pakistan
  • Philippines
  • Qatar
  • Russian Federation
  • Saudi Arabia
  • Sri Lanka
  • Thailand
  • Turkey
  • Uganda
  • Vietnam

 

—

BANGLADESH

Qualifications Foundation year HND/Foundation Degree Degree Top-Up Masters
Higher Secondary Certificate (HSC) Non-standard Non-standard N/A N/A N/A
Diploma in Business Studies/Diploma in Commerce Standard Non-standard N/A N/A N/A
Diploma in Engineering Standard Standard Standard (60% or above) N/A N/A
Bachelor degree (2 years or less than 3) Standard Standard Standard (60% or above) N/A N/A
Bachelor degree (3 years or less than 4) Standard Standard Standard N/A N/A
Bachelor degree (4 years or less than 5) Standard Standard Standard Standard N/A
Bachelor of Science in Engineering N/A N/A N/A N/A Standard (first class – min of 60%)

English Language

Foundation: IELTS 5.0 (or equivalent with no less than 4.5 in any area)
HND/Foundation Degree: IELTS 5.5 (or equivalent with no less than 5.5 in Reading and Writing)
Degree/Top-Up: IELTS 6.0 (or equivalent with no less than 5.5 in any area)
Masters: IELTS 6.0 (or equivalent with Reading and Writing at min 5.5)

If you hold any other qualification than listed above, please submit it to our Admissions team for further information on admissions@rcl.ac.uk

INDIA

Qualifications Foundation year HND/Foundation Degree Degree Top-Up Masters

Indian School Certificate (Class – XII) Standard Standard N/A N/A N/A
Técnico Profesional en (subject area) Standard Standard Standard (60% or above) N/A N/A

Certificate of Vocational Education (CVE – 12) Standard Standard Standard N/A N/A

English Language

Foundation: IELTS 5.0 (or equivalent with no less than 4.5 in any area)
HND/Foundation Degree: IELTS 5.5 (or equivalent with no less than 5.5 in Reading and Writing)
Degree/Top-Up: IELTS 6.0 (or equivalent with no less than 5.5 in any area)
